Articles.Content:
Hello Everybody

i started playing Kerbal last friday and can't turn it off anymore

Why have I discovered this so late?

Anyway, I found the forum because I was looking for plugins and you guys have realy awesome stuff here ^^

Since i'm a visual copmuter science student, I already think about coding a plugin myself

Do you have a good starter tutrial around?

Also, just ignore the spelling mistakes ^^ english is not my first language

I don't know of any modding tutorials, but welcome to the forums anyways! I'll search for one a report back though. Happy to help!

Also, you're english is great for a non native speaker.

Welcome to the forums. There is a forum area for add-on development, which has a help and support sub-forum for plugin development.
